Articles.Content:
Hi All,

I've been getting some slightly odd behaviour when I open KSP.

I'm running a pretty heavily modded install, but resources aren't an issue (32GB DDR4 2400Mhz RAM, 8-core hyperthreaded i7-5960X (3Ghz, no overclock), 2x 2GB NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 760 Graphics Cards).

Like I say, my install is pretty heavily modded, but I don't think that's the root because its inconsistent.

Spoiler

KSP: 1.1.2 (Win64) - Unity: 5.2.4f1 - OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 (6.1.7601) 64bit
MagiCore - 1.1.1
Filter Extensions - 2.6

USI Core - 0.2.3
Asteroid Recycling Tech - 0.8.3
USI Exploration Pack - 0.5.3
Freight Transport Tech - 0.5.3
Kolonization Core - 0.2.3.1
USI-LS - 0.4.3.1
NuclearRockets - 0.2.3
USI Survivability Pack - 0.5.3
UKS - 0.40.3
USI Alcubierre Drive - 0.4.3
KSP Interstellar Extended - 1.8.28
WildBlueTools - 1.2.8
Deep Space Exploration Vessels - 1.1.6
[x] Science! - 4.18

 

Basically, when I open, usually it opens the whole program to the main menu in about 90 seconds - 2 minutes. But occasionally I'll open it and it will barely have loaded anything after 20 minutes. I leave it a couple of hours, re-load and I'm in, in the usual 2 minutes. No changes made, just walking away from the machine or opening a different game for a few hours.

Anyone got any ideas about what might be causing it?

Thanks
